channel.title: Comments on: Dummyimage.com Gets New Features

item.title: By: Image Generator | BlackWs.OrG
item.dc:creator: Image Generator | BlackWs.OrG
item.description: [...] March 10th, 2010, (Chuck Norris’ Birthday & International Day of Awesomeness) I launched version 2 of dummyimage.com.This added color options, the ability to customize the text displayed on the image, and a simple [...]
item.content:encoded: […] March 10th, 2010, (Chuck Norris’ Birthday & International Day of Awesomeness) I launched version 2 of dummyimage.com.This added color options, the ability to customize the text displayed on the image, and a simple […]

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description:
You can use a pipe character | to force a line break but it has trouble centering the text then.
http://dummyimage.com/600x400/000/fff.png&text=hello|world
One of these days I may get around to fix it. Thanks for your question.
item.content:encoded:
You can use a pipe character | to force a line break but it has trouble centering the text then.

http://dummyimage.com/600×.....text=hello|world

One of these days I may get around to fix it. Thanks for your question.

item.title: By: Dylan
item.dc:creator: Dylan
item.description: Does Dummyimage support line breaks for the custom text, and if not, will it ever? Thanks for all the great work work. I use this web app all the time.
item.content:encoded: Does Dummyimage support line breaks for the custom text, and if not, will it ever? Thanks for all the great work work. I use this web app all the time.

item.title: By: funny cat
item.dc:creator: funny cat
item.description: Hi author! Can I, take pics from your website for my degree work?
item.content:encoded: Hi author! Can I, take pics from your website for my degree work?

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: The fact that you took the time to leave a comment on my otherwise bare blog, makes me happy.
item.content:encoded: The fact that you took the time to leave a comment on my otherwise bare blog, makes me happy.

item.title: By: Philip
item.dc:creator: Philip
item.description: The simplicity and utility of this site makes me happy.
item.content:encoded: The simplicity and utility of this site makes me happy.

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: Hmmm something like adding ETags and Future Expires headers? I'll look into that.
item.content:encoded: Hmmm something like adding ETags and Future Expires headers? I’ll look into that.

item.title: By: Volker
item.dc:creator: Volker
item.description: Wouldn't it be a good idea to allow caching on the images (using proper headers)?
item.content:encoded: Wouldn’t it be a good idea to allow caching on the images (using proper headers)?
